SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT r.FiscalYear, b.CostCenterType, r.CostCenter, r.AccountCode, r.StandardBriefID, r.periodLabel FROM covi_budget4j.bem_regist r JOIN covi_budget4j.vw_cost_center b ON r.CompanyCode = b.CompanyCode AND r.CostCenter = b.CostCenterCode JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON r.CompanyCode = c.CompanyCode AND r.AccountCode = c.AccountCode LEFT JOIN covi_budget4j.bem_execute_regist e ON r.CompanyCode = e.CompanyCode AND r.FiscalYear = e.FiscalYear AND r.accountcode = e.accountcode AND r.standardBriefid = e.standardBriefid AND e.ExecuteDate BETWEEN r.validFrom AND r.validTo AND r.CostCenter = e.BudgetCode WHERE r.companyCode = #{companyCode} AND r.FiscalYear = #{fiscalYear}
AND b.CostCenterType = #{costCenterType}
AND b.costCenterName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{costCenterName},'%')
